captions: Visit the COVID-19 Information Center for vaccine resources.

An Aegean Adventure • A collection of memories spanning 4 Grecian islands: Crete, Santorini, Corfu & Rhodes. 
This was a special campaign to be apart of, not only to be joined by friends who feature within this video, but also as a Tourism Board X @AegeanAirlines collaboration was my first job since the pandemic started. Greece has done a phenomenal job at vaccinating entire island populations to open up their country to the world, where so many can’t wait to visit & return. ✈️🇬🇷 We’ll all be back soon to explore what the mainland has to offer.

Link in bio to check out @AegeanAirlines’ discount offers on direct flights to destinations across Greece this summer! #AegeanAirlines #SunshineDiscount #VisitGreece

Team featured: @postcardsbyhannah @delphinepolson @lebackpacker @offthepath @wonguy974 @brubol @mpapa_dop @travlrr_official

Macao in 60 seconds..🇲🇴 a city like no other - a place where East meets West in a fusion of culture, architecture and cuisine. From the city’s lights, enchanting sights & market delights - here’s a little montage of our 4 days of discovery. • @MacaoUSA @Expedia #VisitMacao #WowMacao #Sp 📽 : Captured & edited by @dominic_doring - wouldn’t have been an epic trip with out ya mate!
Abu Dhabi memories summed up in 60 seconds. 📽 - Video & Editing by the insanely talented: @dominic_doring!

A few moments from my time in Abu Dhabi...🐪✨🇦🇪 Earlier this month, myself & @dominic_doring ventured to this incredible Emirate in search of adventure, culture & camels. Safe to say, this experience will stay with me for a lifetime. Huge thanks to @VisitAbuDhabi for making this trip one for the books! #InAbuDhabi.
Videography by the amazingly talented, @dominic_doring. Be sure to check out his socials for more of his creations. 🤘🏽📽

Stories from the open road…🚗🇪🇸 I captured these four snaps on a journey to Cofete Beach. Download the @ThomasCook app, where you’ll be able to find all of what I got up to from my time here. It’s an app to connect with fellow travellers, source inspiration for your next adventure and book all in one place. ✈️✨ #ThomasCookApp
#LoveitBookitThomasCookit #AD

ad Journey to completion…✨🇪🇸 Barcelona was our last point of call onboard @CelebrityCruisesUK's newest ship Celebrity Apex ship. I decided to stay on an extra day after we docked to get a feel for the city & it's safe to say, it's one I'd love to live in for a few months. My time at sea was one I won't forget. From sipping cocktails on the Rooftop Garden at sunset to watching the insanely talented theatre performances or dancing till 2am - cheers for all the good times. 🛳🥂🌊 

#celebrityapex #celebritycruisesuk

#barcelona #bcn #mediterranean

#hellofrom Fuerteventura! ✨I’ve swapped the cold English weather for a few days of Canary Island sunshine. I’m currently loving my time here exploring what this unique island has to offer - just look at these dunes! I’m sharing my time here over on @ThomasCook so be sure to check out what I’ve been getting up to by watching their stories. 👀🇪🇸 Link in bio to download their new app! [ad]
#LoveitBookitThomasCookit #ThomasCook
